trends: There have been 173 other sightings in Tucson
There were no other sightings in Tucson on or around June 1st 2010
Summary: early morning on June 1, i was Stargazing with a set of pvs-14 night vision. i first noticed what appeared to be a sat. my focus was shifted to a flash at near 90 degrees. i was startled because the flash left a trail directly back ro the "satellite "
divs: Sighting DetailsThe object was travelling roughly sweet and flashed east. Definitely in upper atmosphere if not low earth orbit. I am 43 years of age.
